title: Experiential Learning-Based Project Design for Low-Cost Housing Social Innovation

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational knowledge of urban planning, architectural design, and social innovation project management
context.additional_context: Graduate-level project-based learning environment emphasizing collaboration and hands-on practice for solving real-world social issues

learning_goals: Learners can analyze three or more social innovation models for solving affordable housing issues
Learners can develop housing design prototypes through community collaboration using a PBL approach
Learners can verify sustainable architectural solutions under budget constraints using simulation tools
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
